page.title: 06KINGSWOOD VILLAGE SHOW
page.content: In Kingswood, in the middle of September, it is traditional to have a show day. This takes place at the village hall and on the playing field next to it. The most important part is the classic car show. Many people come and show off their old cars. This year,just for fun, there was also a lawn-mower display when peole drove their lawn-mowers round in circles. There are side shows and stalls on the playing field, like "Win A Teddy", a tin can shy, White Elephant, tombola and skittles. In the village hall, there are various shows: there are competitions for children and prizes for three different age groups. There is a show for the Women's Institute and a vegetable show. There is a knitting show, a calligraphy show, a picture show and a toy show.
